alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Chester; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 5:42PM EST until January 12 at 6:45PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... Northwestern Chester County in Upstate South Carolina... Western York County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Spartanburg County in Upstate South Carolina... Central Cherokee County in Upstate South Carolina... Northern Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EST. * At 542 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Gaffney to 11 miles northwest of Laurens, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Union, York, Clover, Woodruff, Pacolet, Monarch Mill, Buffalo, Gray Court, Jonesville and Pacolet Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EST for Upstate South Carolina. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.

area.areaDesc: Cherokee; Chester; Laurens; Spartanburg; Union; York
